scripts.bundle: parcel build index.html && replace-in-file '<script src="/' '<script src="./' ./dist/index.html,./dist/index.html && inline-assets --htmlmin --cssmin dist/index.html dist/bundle.html
scripts.postbundle: mkdir temp && mv dist/* temp/ && mv temp/*.html dist/ && rm -r temp
scripts.start: yarn run buildtypes && yarn run bundle && cargo run
scripts.build: yarn run buildtypes && yarn run bundle && cargo build
